zone.line: is no longer, and what I most dreaded in
this world is come upon me. In the
despair of my heart I see what you
cannot conceal: you no longer love
me. I adjure you, my father, has not
an unnatural passion seized upon
your heart? Am I not the most mise-
rable worm that crawls? Do I not
embrace your knees, and you most
cruelly repulse me? I know it – I see
it – you hate me!"
I was transported by violent
emotion, and rising from his feet, at
which I had thrown myself, I leant
against a tree, wildly raising my eyes
to heaven. He began to answer with
violence: "Yes, yes, I hate you! You
are my bane, my poison, my disgust!"
And then his manner changed, and
fixing his eyes on me with an expression
that convulsed every nerve and member
of my frame – "you are none of all
these; you are my light, my only one,
Oh! No,"
